short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple browser extension that removes the for you feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser enables users to hide the "For you" Twitter feed which is a feed generated by Twitter on posts you may wish to see. While it can be useful for learning about new pages and people it can also be very distracting. This chrome extension removes the "For you" feed from Twitter and thus, only enables users to see the "Following" feed which consists of posts from people they follow. Therefore, the overall purpose of this extension is to give users more control over their Twitter feeds so that they don't waste time on algorithmically generated content which is very engaging in nature.
